data.title: WO2006032087A1 - Infection resistant plants and methods for their generation - Google Patents
data.meta_description: The invention relates generally to virus resistant plants, wherein the plants are resistant to aphid transmitted viruses. In particular, the invention relates to a method for protecting a plant from aphid-borne viral infection, comprising the step of introducing a nucleic acid molecule into a plant, which nucleic acid molecule codes for an aphid transmission factor.
